statements: DELETE FROM employee_work_logs WHERE employee_id = 101 AND log_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM employee_work_logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' AND work_hours >= 6.0;
DELETE FROM EmployeeWorkLogs WHERE employee_id = 123 AND log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
DELETE FROM Timesheets WHERE employee_id = 456 AND total_hours > 40;
DELETE FROM EmployeeWorkLogs WHERE log_date < '2022-03-01' OR hours_worked < 8;
DELETE FROM employee_timesheets WHERE employee_id = 123 AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM employee_productivity WHERE productivity_rating < 3 AND notes LIKE '%improve%';
DELETE FROM work_logs WHERE employee_id = 101 AND log_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM timesheets WHERE employee_id = 101 AND total_hours <= 40
